subject: Attention: Honorable Beneficia
body:
Attention: Honorable Beneficiary  
Greetings.
Compliments of the day and many Greetings!
Re-Interest Fund Payment of US$200,000.00 Approved in your favor!
Our pleasure to inform you of the appended large debit instruction received from the office of the United States Secret Service (USSS). Federal law enforcement agency under The (United States Department of Homeland Security). to commence immediate transfer of your approved Interest Fund Payment valued sum of US$200,000.00 (Two Hundred Thousand US Dollars only). From their ESCROW BONDED ACCOUNT with the Cadence Bank (USA). in your favor.
Therefore, kindly reconfirm to us that your Business Representative (Mr. Delet Friedrich Scheer). Bank accounts stated below correct ? to enable us commence immediate transfer of your approved Interest fund which is the exact amount of (US$200,000.00).
Mr. Delet Friedrich Scheer  Account Details:-
 
Bank Name: Volksbank Saaletal eG
Bank Address: am Markt 2, D-07426 KÃ¶nigsee Country Germany
Account Number: 40005560
IBAN:  DE07830944540040005560
Swift Code:  GENODEF1RUJ
Account Name: Scheer Baerbel
Beneficiary Address: Schmieden Nr.6 D-07407 Uhlstaedt-Kirchhasel Germany    
Therefore, should you notice that your Business Representative Account Number: 400 055 60: Entered is Incorrect, please review his correct Account Number as soon as possible.
Endeavor to acknowledge the receipt of this message urgently today. Because we are committed to finalize all pending Interest transactions before the end of next week as Instructed and mandated by the U.S. Department of the Treasury. to release your approved Interest fund to you with immediate effect.
Find Attached Fund Release Approval document Issued in favor of your Business Representative (Mr. Delet Friedrich Scheer). because according to your Business Representative (Mr. Delet Friedrich Scheer). He said that you are very sick. Therefore, you have Authorized him to claim your Interest fund, that you could not proceed and claim the fund (US$200,000.00).  
As a matter of urgency, we need a re-confirmation from you if (Mr. Delet Friedrich Scheer). is your Business Representative before we can proceed to issue a final payment release order in his favor.
I await your immediate response.
Yours sincerely,
Mr. Ole Halgren
Director Remittance Dept,
Remittance Operations Unit
Cadence Bank (USA).
100 S Veterans Memorial Blvd,
Tupelo,MS 38804, United States of America

subject: Re: Attention: Honorable Beneficia
body:
Hello Mr. Ole Halgren,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. It's quite a surprise to hear about this approved Interest Fund Payment. I must say, it's not every day that one receives such news.

However, I'm a bit confused about this Mr. Delet Friedrich Scheer you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about him? How is he related to my business?

Also, could you clarify what exactly this Interest Fund Payment is for? I don't recall having any pending interests or transactions with the Cadence Bank USA.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William
